```{r}
# Load Packages
library(readr) # read csv file in
library(dplyr) # Data manipulation
```

```{r}
# Setup - Load in data file
# set working directory as source file location
# Read in upzipped .csv data from "input" folder within

df1 <- read_csv("input/Data_2000-2016_county_monthly_combined.csv")
df2 <- read_csv("input/CompMort.csv")

# Merge data
df3 <- merge(
    df2,
    df1,
    all.x = TRUE,
    by.x = "County Code",
    by.y = "GEOID"
) 

# Clean data
df4 <- df3 %>%
    mutate(
        CVD.adj = `Age Adjusted Rate`,
        GEOID = `County Code`
        ) %>% # Add column name consistent with paper
    filter(!is.na(CVD.adj)) %>% # Remove missing mortality data
    mutate(
        across(
            c(GEOID), as.factor
        )
    ) %>% # Change county to factor
    dplyr::select(
        c(
            GEOID,
            year_month,
            year,
            month,
            PM25,
            NO2,
            O3,
            Tmean,
            dewT
        )
    ) # Select required columns
```
